hero.title: Harvest Your Tasks
hero.description: Join Amrita the squirrel on a playful journey to manage your tasks! SquirreList turns every to-do into an acorn to harvest, keeping you motivated with streaks and reminders. Experience a fun, simple, and effective way to stay on track every day. Download now and start harvesting!

whyUs.title: Why SquirreList?
whyUs.card1Desc: Amrita cheers you on as you harvest each task!
whyUs.card2Desc: Manage tasks easily with a clean, intuitive interface.
whyUs.card3Desc: Reminders and streaks keep you motivated every day.

features.title: Our Features
features.taskListDesc: Organize your tasks with categories and smart reminders.
features.streakDesc: Build streaks by completing tasks daily with Amrita.
features.motivationDesc: Celebrate every task done with Amrita's joyful cheers!
features.customDesc: Add tags, stickers, and checklists to personalize tasks.

blog.title: Latest Insights
blog.post1Desc: Discover how SquirreList can transform your daily productivity and help you achieve more.
blog.post2Desc: Learn about the journey of Amrita, our beloved squirrel mascot, and how she inspires productivity.
blog.post3Desc: Explore the latest task management strategies and tips for staying organized in 2025.

roadmap.title: My Development Journey
roadmap.subtitle: This is how SquirreList came to life — from an idea to a real product built with Flutter.
roadmap.step1Desc: I came up with the idea for SquirreList and started designing its user experience and interface.
roadmap.step2Desc: I developed SquirreList using Flutter — implementing all core features like task creation, smart reminders, and UI animations.
roadmap.step3Desc: SquirreList officially launched on app stores — ready for users to boost productivity and organize their life better.

download.title: Start Harvesting Your Tasks Today
download.description: Download SquirreList now and take control of your productivity with our powerful, yet simple task management app.

footer.description: SquirreList helps you collect and organize your tasks efficiently, just like a squirrel preparing for winter. Our modern task management app keeps you productive and organized.
